description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Small House over the Water, and other stories. ... With portrait and ... illustrations by G. Cruikshank, etc" Author: LEMON, Mark. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012633.k.23." Page: 197 Place of Publishing: pp. 280. Sampson Low & Co.: London, 1888 Date of Publishing: 1888 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002128231 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
